title: Former Mellon Bank CEO Recalls a Life in Finance
itunes:title: Former Mellon Bank CEO Recalls a Life in Finance
description:
Former Mellon Bank CEO Martin G. McGuinn Jr. discusses his memoir From Swampoodle to Mellon Bank CEO: An Irish-American’s Journey, the Autobiography of Martin G. McGuinn Jr.
Hosts: Paul Sweeney and Mike Regan Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
